resources.string: Adresa e-pošte ne može biti kraća od SYMBOLS_NUMBER simbola.
Adresa e-pošte ne može biti duža od SYMBOLS_NUMBER simbola.

Lozinka ne može biti duža od SYMBOLS_NUMBER simbola.
Proces koji želite izvršiti prelazi iznad dopuštenog mjesečnog učitavanja i stoga nije moguće ga izvršiti.
This notebook is view only. Ask the notebook owner to give you full access.
You can view notes only. Ask the notebook owner to give you full access.
Only numbers, letters, hyphens, and underscores
Must begin with a number or letter
Must end with a number or letter
Network Error. Please try again later.
Spremite svoje ideje. Sve što volite, čitate, slušate ili gledate.
Evernote radi s gotovo svim aktualnim računalima, smartphone ili mobilnim uređajima.
Search by keyword, tag or even printed and handwritten text inside images.
"We're syncing lots of data which can take a while, we recommend that you use a wireless network and keep your device charged."
Neuspjelo povezivanje s Evernote poslužiteljem za ažuriranja
Dostupna je nova inačica Evernote za Android:
Učitavanje bilješke CURRENT_NOTE od TOTAL_NOTES bilješki

Veza sa mrežom ne može biti uspostavljena.
Dogodila se pogreška tijekom komunikacije s Evernote.

Vaša lozinka ne prenosi se na poslužitelj.
Potrebno je da se prijavite ili kreirate besplatni Evernote račun da biste dijelili sadržaj s drugima.
SD kartica je potrebna za upotrebu Evernote.
Attributions, Terms of Service, Privacy Policy

Da biste dodali ovaj privitak u bilješku potrebno je da ste Evernote Premium korisnik
Da biste kreirali veliku bilješku potrebno je da ste Evernote Premium korisnik
Access notebooks offline, and more notes each month, and lots more.
Dodajte Web Clipper u vaš preglednik
Dodajte zabilješku u vaš preglednik, kreirajte isječke web stranica u Evernote.
Offline notebooks allow you to access your notes without needing a network connection.
You can email notes, photos, and audio clips from your computer or mobile device right into an Evernote notebook.
Search through notes stored on your device without a network connection
If you have a lot of notes and PDFs, this may take up significant storage space
Obavijest statusa učitavanja u traci statusa
Veća potrošnja baterije i pogled neba
Brisanje bilješki lokalno spremljenih na SD kartici
Obriši podatke o bilješkama spremljenim na SD Karticu. Sačuva offline bilježnice.
No more allowance to create new notes
Using the hardware menu button toggles the bottom actionbar
Go to notebooks list, tap the download icon and choose which notebooks to set offline
Odaberite za provjeru autentičnost vaše prijave
You cannot register at the moment. This is likely caused by a bad connection to the internet.
You are not connected to the internet. Please try again later.
Vaši podaci nisu spremljeni. Sigurno želite odbaciti ovu bilješku?
Izmjene nisu spremljene. Sigurno želite odbaciti izmjene?
Izmjene oznaka nisu spremljene. Sigurno želite odbaciti izmjene?
The storage space is not accessible when the device is connected to your PC.
Please insert a memory card before using Evernote.
Sigurno želite odbaciti ovu e-poruku? Svi unešeni podaci biti će izgubljeni.
Sigurno želite odustati od ove e-poruke?
Potrebno je da unesete minimalno jednu adresu e-pošte.
Automatically sync data only when connected to a wireless network.
Automatically sync notes in the background
"Saves selected notebook on your device and keeps it up-to-date. Notebooks selected (%1$d/%2$d)"
Another username has already joined this notebook
Not able to connect. Try again later
Offline search, clear search history, clear cache
Please enable Location from device settings.
Pretragu trenutno nije moguće dovršiti. Provjerite vašu mrežnu konekciju i pokušajte ponovno kasnije
No activity found to handle this action
No application found to open this attachment
Cannot create a new tag in a joined notebook
Evernote is not able to access all the required files from memory card. If the problem persists then please restart your phone and make sure that the memory card is mounted properly
Evernote is not able to create the database file. If the problem persists then please restart your device and make sure that the memory card is not full
Evernote is not able to open the database file. If the problem persists then please restart your device and make sure that the memory card is mounted properly
The Evernote database has become corrupted. Evernote will now try to resync your notes.
Move your Evernote files to your SD card for better performance. Requires a good quality SD card and enough free memory
Move your Evernote files to your device if you encounter issues with your SD card.
Please sync all your unsaved notes before proceeding ahead
Moving your Evernote file to your device will disable offline search. Continue?
"Odjava... Removing spremljenih datoteka iz međuspremnika može potrajati."
Odjavom uklanjate sve bilješke i offline bilježnice spremljene u međuspremnik vašeg uređaja.elite se odjaviti?
"WARNING: You have unsynchronized notes. Logging out will save local changes in sdcard in Evernote/unsaved_notes/. Do you want to sign out?"
Veza je prekinuta. Sinkronizacija bilješki je pauzirana
Zaglavlja preuzeta. Sada možete početi koristiti Evernote.
Ne možete pristupiti ovoj bilješci jer pripada drugom korisniku
This audio file type might not be supported by your device
Tražena bilješka je u bilježnici koja nije lokalno sinkronizirana. Potrebno je da sinkronizirate \"%s\" da biste imali pristup bilješci
Sadržaj bilješke trenutno nije moguće preuzeti. Provjerite vašu mrežnu konekciju i pokušajte ponovno kasnije
Sadržaj stranice trenutno nije moguće prikazati. Provjerite mrežnu vezu i pokušajte ponovno kasnije
Bilješku nije moguće otvoriti jer link bilješke nije ispravan
Check apps on the market for supporting this content
Check apps on Google Play for supporting this content
This version of Evernote does not support inline editing of
This note contains some unsupported formatting.
Tap each individual part to edit the content.
"Kreirajte novi račun za savršenu memoriju. Zapamtite sve, besplatno!"
Pogrešno korisničko ime. Molimo, odjavite se i pokušajte ponovno prijavu.
Please try again or switch to %s if your account is on that service.
Your phone may have lost its network connection
Your phone has no network connection
"Odabrana akcija će zaustaviti i spremiti glasovni snimak. Želite li nastaviti snimanje?"
Prazne bilješke ne mogu se spremiti
Please wait until the default notebook is synced to the device
Please wait until the notebook is synced to the device
Please wait until the tags are synced to the device
Možete dodati izmjene ovoj bilješci ili urediti pojedinačne elemente teksta
Potrebno je za čitanje podataka s Evernote pružatelja
Potrebno je za pisanje podataka s Evernote pružatelja
Upgrade to Premium to create a big note.
There is not enough space on the memory to sync your notes.
There is not enough space on the device to sync your notes.
Please delete some files to free space.
please delete some files from device to free space
Čestitamo! Vaš uređaj je kvalificiran za besplatnu jednogodišnju nadogradnju na Evernote Premium
Vaš uređaj je kvalificiran za besplatnu jednogodišnju nadogradnju na Evernote Premium
Žao nam je, ovaj uređaj nije kvalificiran za besplatnu nadogradnju na Premium račun ili je nadogradnja već iskorištena.
Žao nam je, ovaj račun nije kvalificran za nadogradnju na Premium. Molimo prijavite se s drugim računom.
Čestitamo! Vaš račun nadgrađen je na Premium.
Congratulations! You have received %1$s point(s). Manage your points from Settings.
Sinkronizacija je prekinuta od strane korisnika
Sign out to configure a new account on the current memory card
Continue to re-configure your existing account on the current memory card
Exit Evernote and wait to get the old memory card back in
"Evernote has detected that your memory card has changed. What do you want to do ?"
"You no longer have access to this joined notebook. Please contact the notebook's owner."
These options are for QA to control the test environment
U offline modusu nije moguće preuzeti info bilježnice.
Failed to join notebook because no network connection present.
Are you sure you want to leave the notebook \"%s\"?
Kliknite na polje da biste preimenovali
If you like Evernote, please rate us in the market.
If you like Evernote, please rate us on Google Play.
Sorry, the Google Play App is not available on your device, so you cannot rate Evernote.

Hvala što koristite Evernote. Da li znate da možete da nadograditi vaš račun na Evernote Premium i dobiti 1GB mjesečno za otpremu, mogućnost sinkronizacije datoteka, PDF pretragu, prioritet u prepoznavanju fotografija i još mnogo toga?

Oprez, koristite Evernote prilično često. Iskoristili ste više od 50% vaše dopuštene mjesečne kvote za otpremu. Ako premašite kvotu, izgubiti ćete mogućnost dodavanja ili izmjena u bilješkama. Da biste izbjegli prekoračenje, nadogradite na Evernote Premium i dobiti ćete 1GB mjesečno za otpremu, mogućnost sinkronizacije datoteka, PDF pretragu, prioritetno prepoznavanje slika i još mnogo toga.

Oprez, iskoristili ste više od 75% vaše mjesečne dozvoljene kvote. Ako premašite kvotu, izgubiti ćete mogućnost dodavanja ili izmjena u bilješkama. Da biste izbjegli prekoračenjem nadogradite na Evernote Premium i dobiti ćete 1GB mjesečno za otpremu, mogućnost sinkronizacije datoteka, PDF pretragu, prioritetno prepoznavanje slika i još mnogo toga.

Vašom narednom beleškom možda ćete prekoračiti mesečnu kvotu. Iskoristili ste više od 95% dozvoljenog mesečnog protoka. Ako premašite kvotu, nećete moći više da dodate ni uređujete ni jednu belešku. Da biste izbegli prekoračenje, pređite na Evernote premium i dobićete 1GB mesečnog protoka, sinhronizaciju novih verzija dokumenata, pretragu PDF-ova, prioritetno prepoznavanje slika i još više.

Žao nam je, operacija koju želite izvršiti ne može biti izvršena jer prelazi vašu dozvoljenu kvotu za učitavanja za ovaj mjesec. Nadogradite svoj račun na Evernote Premium i 1GB imati ćete na raspolaganju za učitavanja, mogućnost sinkronizacije datoteka, pretragu PDF datoteka, prioritet u prepoznavanju slika i ostalo.
Poruka spremljena na uređaju, ali neće biti otpremljena do sljedećeg mjesečnog ciklusa.
Dosegnuli ste maksimalno dozvoljeni broj netočnih pokušaja. Molimo unesite vašu Evernote lozinku da biste resetirali PIN
PIN broj iz potvrde se ne podudara.
Kada aktivirate PIN zaključavanje, PIN je potreban za pregled i pretragu bilješki.
Prevuci pribadaču da biste postavili lokaciju.
Evernote Premium omogućava spremanje bilješki offline, možete ih pregledavati brže i bez povezivanja na mrežu.
Evernote Premium omogućava vam da spremate bilješke offline, možete ih pregledavati brže i bez povezivanja na mrežu. Za podešavanje, otvorite Postavke > Offline bilježnice.
"Sorry, we couldn't start the web browser. Please visit %s to upgrade."
Evernote može tražiti riječi unutar spremljenih slika. Pokušajte fotografirati jelovnike, vinske boce ili ploče za pisanje.
You can access all of the notes you create on your Mac, Windows PC or on the web. Go to %s to find out how to get Evernote everywhere.
The same note is modified by some other user as well. Your changes are moved to a separate new note
New note - Create a new note with your changes.
Bilježnica ne može biti dulja od 100 znakova.
Naslov ove bilježnice sadrži znakove koji nisu podržani.
Bilježnica s ovim naslovom već postoji.
Skupina s ovim naslovom već postoji.
Skupina ne može biti veća od 100 znakova.
Naslov ove skupine sadrži nepodržane znakove.
Skupina će biti spojena s postojećom skupinom s istim naslovom.
You have reached the max number of notebooks allowed.
Evernote recently reset your password. Have you set a new password?
Password updated successfully. Please re-enter password.

Adresa e-pošte ne može biti prazna
Korisničko ime ne može biti prazno.
Your account is created but we cannot sign you in for the moment. Please try later.
Da bismo potvrdili registraciju vašeg računa molimo unesite ispod navedene znamenke
Adresa e-pošte već je u uporabi.
Email address in use and deactivated.
Korisničko ime već je u uporabi.
Email already in use. Double check it or try to sign in, you may have already registered.
Nije moguće provjeriti korisničko ime. Ako se ovaj problem nastavi, molimo kontaktirajte korisničku podršku.
Korisničko ime ili e-pošta mora biti unešeno.
Reset password failed. Please wait a little and try again later.
Nema računa povezanog s ovom adresom e-pošte.
Nema računa povezanog s ovim korisničkim imenom.

Račun povezan s ovim korisničkim imenom je deaktiviran.
An email with the password reset instructions was sent to your email address.
Please wait a little while before trying again.
You cannot sign in at the moment. This is likely caused by a bad connection to the internet.
You cannot reset your password at the moment. This is likely caused by a bad connection to the internet.
Kliknite ovdje da biste kreirali novu bilješku
Type a new note, take a photo, record some audio, or attach a file. Then, your notes will sync to all the computers and devices you use.
Use notebooks to group your notes. Create notebooks for interests, projects, travel, and more. Organize notebooks into Stacks to show or hide groups of notebooks.
"You don't have any notebooks yet. Go ahead and create one!"
Use tags to connect and organize similar notes across your account. Add tags when you create and edit notes, then find those notes on this screen.
Create tags when you make new notes or edit existing ones.
When location services are enabled, a place is automatically associated with the notes you create. This screen displays your notes by location.
Notes are automatically organized into Places when you create a note with location services enabled.
Shared Notebooks are a way for Evernote users to share entire notebooks with other users. This can be useful for shared lists, collaboration, and much more!
"You don't have any shared notebooks yet."
"You don't have any notes tagged with %s"
"You don't have any notes tagged with %1$s and %2$s"
If enabled, notes on your device will appear on the map
Shared Notebooks are notebooks that have been shared to you by other Evernote users. If you have one you should select it from the left and sync it to your device.
Please enable a My Location source in system settings.
Note title cannot be longer than 100 characters.
Please uninstall the app and then reinstall to fix the problem.
Tag must be between 1 and 100 characters long.
Only the owner of a notebook may create new tags.
Congratulations. Your account is now Premium
Processing transaction. Your new expiry date will appear soon.
Browse and search through notebooks offline
"Google Wallet was unable to process your payment. Go to Evernote's website to complete your Premium upgrade?"
Technical support, send log, app version
You will receive an email and notification once payment is fully processed
"This app cannot connect to Google Play. Your version of Google Play may be out of date. You can continue to use this app but you won't be able to make purchases."
Please launch the Google Play app and accept the terms and conditions before trying again.
Your subscription will automatically renew. You can cancel it at any time.
The standard widget is not available when Evernote is moved to the SD card. Get the new Evernote Widget App.
There is a separate widget app with configurable styles, buttons and note lists.
This widget is old, get the new version!
This is the old widget. Choose an \"Evernote Widget\" to place the new one on the home screen.
Remove this widget and place the new \"Evernote Widget\" on your homescreen.
Access features immediately from your home screen and quickly capture or view notes with one tap.
Long press on your home screen to place widget anywhere
Choose an \"Evernote Widget\" from the Widget tab in your list of apps.
"Tap the settings icon to customize your widget's style and change the buttons to access features and notes you use most."
To place the widget on your home screen, press and hold on an empty space on your home screen, then select an \"Evernote Widget\" from the list.\"
To place the widget on your home screen, choose an \"Evernote Widget\" from the Widget tab in your list of apps.
Sorry, Google Play is not available on your device.
Your markup is not saved. Are you sure you want to discard it?
There was an error loading the notebook sharing page.
There was an error loading your contacts.
I would like to share an Evernote notebook named %s with you:
Check out what I’m sharing on Evernote
You appear to be offline - to view and make any changes to the sharing settings you will have to be online.
You already purchased premium time today. Buy more?
"Use the note sharing URL to allow read access to this note. If you stop sharing, this note's URL will change and people will no longer have access."
You appear to be offline - to view and make any changes to the note sharing settings you will have to be online.
Failed to disable sharing of note
Anyone with the URL can read this note without signing-in.
A note can only be shared once it has been uploaded.
Evernote helps you remember ideas, things you see and things you like across every device you use.
"Let your friends see what you're thinking by sharing individual notes on your favorite social network, over email and through other apps."
Give colleagues and friends access to your notebooks to let them see projects and ideas develop.
Use Skitch to mark up images. Share a memory, convey an idea or communicate visually to friends. Tap the heart to get started.
Click the Save option on overflow menu to Save your note as you work on it.
Tap a list option to create bulleted, numbered or checklists for things like groceries, tasks or preparing to travel.
"Tap on the microphone to record meetings, lectures, even your child's first words. Evernote make them all easy to find, any time."

Photos are a great way to remember any experience or inspiration. Take snapshots of everything from business cards to wine labels. Evernote will keep them together with all of your other notes and memories.
Snap a series of photos with the Evernote camera. To use the default phone camera, go to settings.
"Sometimes it's easier to speak your idea than tap it out. With Speech to Text, Evernote turns your spoken words into easy to find text. Use it while driving or during meetings."
Tap the arrow buttons that appear when you start a bullet or numbered list to indent that line.

"Tap the recorder to capture a short video of interesting moments.
Then tap the timer to change the quality and duration."
Click the Save option on overflow menu to Save your note as you work on it.
Your support ticket was successfully submitted!
Your support ticket is being sent. You will receive a confirmation email when it is registered.
You must have a network connection to submit a support ticket.
Sorry for the inconvenience. Please try again later.
"If you attach the logs, we'll be better able to resolve your problem"
"Can't continue transcription. Please try again later."
"Transcription doesn't work offline. Please try again later or use basic audio capture."
You have less than 5mb remaining on the note, you may not be able to record the full duration

Use the standard video recorder on the device
Here are some of our favorite improvements:
Swipe left and right go from the redesigned home screen to various note views.
View your notes in a compact and easy to scan list.
More colors, larger text and a easier to use layout.

"Get %1$s month(s) of Evernote Premium, compliments of Evernote and %2$s!*
Evernote Premium gives you 1GB of monthly uploads, offline notebooks, PDF searching, faster image recognition, better support and more.
*some restrictions may apply"

"Get %1$s Evernote Point(s), which can be redeemed for %2$s month(s) of free Premium, increased monthly uploads, or other rewards.
*some restrictions may apply."
Are you sure want to exit the promotion? This will give you free Evernote Premium.
Get Skitch to mark up photos, maps, or screenshots.
You need the latest version of Skitch

Skitch is part of the Evernote family of apps. Skitch adds annotation capabilities to Evernote. You can mark up an existing image, capture and point out something on a web page or photo, or start with a blank canvas.
Were moving to a new and better widget!
"Remove the current widget from your home screen and add the \"Evernote List Widget\". The old widgets won’t be around for too much longer."

"With the new Widget, we’ve made the note list look and feel more like being in the app itself. Now you can scroll vertically through notes and resize the height to show more or less.
You can also select My Reminders as your note list to see reminders, change dates and mark as done, all from the widget."
"Evernote is your backup brain. Take notes, keep inspiration, remember everything."
"By pressing Start, I accept the terms and conditions"
"Save and find everything that's important to you."
Photos are a great way to remember any experience or inspiration.
"Tap on the microphone to record meetings, lectures, even your child's first words."
Use Skitch to annotate and draw on images.
Keep organized with grocery lists, tasks, or travel preparations.
"Let your friends see what you're thinking."
Save your note as you work on it.
Access shortcuts to features from your home screen.
"Customize your widget's buttons and style to match how you use Evernote."
"Sometimes it's easier to speak your idea than tap it out."
Add structure and clarity to your meeting notes

Evernote is with you for a lifetime

Turn physical documents into digital notes.
Turn physical documents into digital notes by holding the camera directly above a single page and centering it within the grey box. Optimized for the Evernote Smart Notebook by Moleskine.

Click to create a todo list

Sent once a day in the morning
To opt-in or out of individual joined or business notebooks, select reminder notifications from the menu in your notebook list
Tap the options menu and select Reminder Subscriptions to receive notifications from joined and business notebooks
Select notebooks to subscribe and receive notifications when their reminders come due
You will receive notifications when reminders in this notebook come due
Also include in daily reminder email?
Business notebooks by default are not included in your daily digest.
Do you want all reminders in business notebooks to be included in your daily reminder emails?
Tap the email icon for each business notebook to also include it in your daily reminder email

Evernote for Mac, Windows, and Windows 8
You can use more formatting options, drag images and docs directly into notes and easily go back and forth between your phone and computer.
Tap to get an email with the download link sent to your computer.
If you are having trouble signing in, then you may need to set a new password. For additional help, contact customer support.
Evernote and third party application hosts must match for in app authentication

With Evernote Premium, keep enjoying document editing after your trial expires.
Edit .doc, .ppt, and .xls files directly from your note with OfficeSuite.
Get Evernote Premium and have unlimited use of OfficeSuite to edit .doc, .ppt and .xls files, all directly from a note in Evernote.
Edit attachments directly from Evernote with OfficeSuite
Try editing .doc, .xls and .ppt files directly from Evernote for 1-week or if you have Evernote Premium, enjoy unlimited editing.
Skitch is preparing your annotated PDF for sending. This may take a moment for large documents
